title: Submission of the Regulations made under the Colombo Port City Economic Commission Act, No.11 of 2021, to Parliament
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Investment Promotion to submit the following Regulations made under the Colombo Port City Economic Commission Act, No. 11 of 2021 and published through the following Gazette Notifications, to Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet:

*	Colombo Port City (Offshore Banking - Preliminary) Regulations, 	No.04 of 2024, published through the Gazette Extraordinary 	Notification No.2394/67 dated 2024 07 26.

*	Colombo Port City (Offshore Banking - Prudent Management and Confidence) Regulations, No.05 of 2024, published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2394/66 dated 2024 07 26.
